name: PlusPower
text: Attach PlusPower to your Active Pokémon. At the end of your turn, discard PlusPower. If this Pokémon's attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), the attack does 10 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.

effect.text: Attach PlusPower to your Active Pokémon. At the end of your turn, discard PlusPower. If this Pokémon's attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), the attack does 10 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.

synergies: High damage attackers - Reach OHKO range

competitiveHistory: PlusPower was essential for aggressive decks, often used in multiples to reach key knockout numbers.

rulings.ruling: PlusPower only adds damage if the attack does damage to the Defending Pokemon.
Multiple PlusPowers can be attached for cumulative bonus damage.
PlusPower is discarded at the end of your turn, regardless of whether you attacked.
